name: Sew World
description:
This game tell the story about a young boy who finally discover where all the socks goes when they disappear from the washing machine

The story takes place on an island after a long way in washing machine, in the world of socks, where a boy must try to get a maximum socks and find the missing sock to do it again smile her mom !!! But be careful of the birds that will try to steal your socks.

This game was made in Unity with 7 other members. We were 2 Artist and 5 programmers.
